name: Thermacell Value Pack Refill 48 Hours
description: Everything you need to keep your butane powered Thermacell repeller going for 48 hours of mosquito protection.Provides 5m dome of protection in 10–30 minutes.Each mat lasts for up to 4 hours and goes from blue to white once empty, making it easy to know when to change the mat.Butane canisters lasts for up 12 hours.Kit includes 4 butane canisters and 12 mats.
